casebody.data:
The words “ox as soonthereafter as coim9¿1 CRH be heard,” usual-J^ccs of ar* guments, are unnecessary.

Anonymous.

NOTICE of an intended motion had been given fora certain day in term, without saying, or as soon thereafter as counsel can be heard. The court said, the notice was sufffeient, that those words were superfluous, and that the party might make his motion, on any other day in term.
